mapper.sql:
SELECT evaluation_answer_id, evaluation_answer_state, evaluation_answer_year, evaluation_answer_semester, stu_id, subject_id
FROM evaluation_answer
mapper.insert:
SELECT EVALUATION_ANSWER_ID_SEQ.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO evaluation_answer VALUES ( #{evaluationAnswerId}, #{evaluationAnswerState}, #{evaluationAnswerYear}, #{evaluationAnswerSemester}, #{stuId}, #{subjectId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE evaluation_answer SET evaluation_answer_state = #{evaluationAnswerState}, evaluation_answer_year=#{evaluationAnswerYear}, evaluation_answer_semester=#{evaluationAnswerSemester}, stu_id=#{stuId}, subject_id=#{subjectId} WHERE evaluation_answer_id = #{evaluationAnswerId}
